short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AliExpress Search By Image with an image url or image file.
short.es: Buscar productos por URL de imagen o seleccionar archivo de imagen en AliExpress.
short.fr: Recherchez des produits par URL d'image ou sélectionnez un fichier image sur AliExpress.
short.ru: Ищите товары по URL-адресу изображения или выберите файл изображения на AliExpress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search items on AliExpress.com using an image or photo of products Image url or image file. Very easy to use, lightweight extension to search AliExpress.com items. Check if the product is sold cheaper by another AliExpress seller and best tool for Aliexpress. Also you can now easily create tables to compare Products' price, total sold Products , Seller rating etc. So, Search for products on AliExpress by image url or image file and find similar products.

It is difficult to imagine modern shopping without stores like AliExpress. tens of millions of people are shopping, updating their wardrobe, simplifying their lives thanks to AliExpress. We did not stand aside and decided to make it easier for you to search for the products you are interested in on AliExpress.

We have added functionality that allows you to search for products on AliExpress.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us.
